articles.author: Mike Zeisberger
articles.title: Matthews scores 55th, 56th goals, sets Maple Leafs record against Stars - NHL.com
articles.description: Auston Matthews set a Toronto Maple Leafs record when he scored his 55th goal of the season against the Dallas Stars at American Airlines Center in Dallas on Thursday.
articles.content: Auston Matthews set a Toronto Maple Leafs record when he scored his 55th goal of the season against the Dallas Stars at American Airlines Center in Dallas on Thursday.The 24-year-old forward scored a… [+2582 chars]

articles.title: Users of erectile dysfunction medications at higher risk of eye conditions, new study suggests - Toronto Star
articles.description: Conclusion follows an epidemiological study of health insurance claims of 213,000 American males who were regular users of common medications such as Viagra, Cialis, Levitra and Stendra.
